column2: U.S. seeks $864 mln from Bank of America after fraud verdictUPDATE 1-U.S. seeks $864 mln from Bank of America after fraud verdict NEW YORK
column3: Nov 9 The U.S. government urged that Bank of America Corp pay $863.6 million in damages after a federal jury found it liable for fraud over defective mortgages sold by its Countrywide unit.  UPDATE 1-U.S. seeks $864 mln from Bank of America after fraud verdict NEW YORK
